function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of preparedness for contagious diseases","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and impact on public health","Mitigation":"Implementing preparedness plans, training healthcare workers, and increasing vaccination coverage","Technologies":"Healthcare management systems, disease surveillance technologies, and vaccination tracking systems","People":"General public, healthcare workers, and vulnerable populations","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health agencies, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate recovery activities after a disease outbreak","Impact":"Prolonged public health crisis, economic impact, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Building resilient healthcare infrastructure, establishing effective recovery plans, and providing mental health support","Technologies":"Telemedicine, remote patient monitoring, and healthcare data analytics","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, and affected communities","Owner":"Healthcare organizations, public health agencies, and government authorities"},{"Description":"Limited resilience in infrastructure systems","Impact":"Risk of disease transmission through contaminated infrastructure, inadequacy of healthcare facilities, and disruption of essential services","Mitigation":"Improving infrastructure hygiene, upgrading healthcare facilities, and enhancing emergency response capabilities","Technologies":"Smart infrastructure technologies, remote monitoring systems, and advanced sanitation and disinfection technologies","People":"Public using infrastructure, healthcare workers, and emergency responders","Owner":"Infrastructure management organizations, healthcare organizations, and government authorities"}]}
